Sev1 escalations.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Platform Automation - Remove human efforts, increase quality with repeatable scenarios, reduce load on Support, End-user, Operations and Enterprise Applications teams and improve the turnaround time on usersâ€™ requests. Operational Awareness. Infrastructure monitoring & alerting. Application monitoring & alerting. Security monitoring & alerting. Performance monitoring & alerting. NMS (SolarWinds to be replaced)/Datadog (monitoring)/New Relic (monitoring) with auto-discovery, Splunk (log consolidation), OpsGenie (alerting). Status pages for in-scope systems. Awareness for IT tools and platforms: Perforce, Atlassian, Okta, Linux/Windows hosts, backups.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}}"
